product.title: Lssam Blow Dryer Comb, 1Pc Black Universal Hair Dryer Comb Attachment for Straightening and Detangling - Nozzle Plastic Hairdressing Salon Blow Comb for Curly, Natural Hair - Styling Tools Appliances
product.description:
üíñüíñüíñWelcome to Lssam, where every corner holds a surprise!

 


Wind Comb Collection Air Mouth Collection Air Nozzle Shape Hair Dryer Air Nozzle Flat Mouth Poly Air Mouth Blow Hair Hairdressing Tool
Features:
Efficient air collection: This hair dryer air comb air collection nozzle adopts a unique shape design, which can effectively concentrate the wind force, enhance the blowing effect of the hair dryer, and make your hair dry faster.
Mute effect: The air collector of this hair dryer adopts a silent design, even when it is running at high power, it will not produce too much noise, allowing you to enjoy a quiet and comfortable environment during use.
Multi-functional and applicable: This hair dryer air comb collector nozzle is not suitable for general hair blowing, but also can be used for hair styling, and can achieve a variety of blowing effects with simple operations.
Flat nozzle design: The air collecting nozzle of this hair dryer is designed with a flat nozzle, which can better fit the of the hair, concentrate the wind, and be more convenient to use.
HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS: This hair dryer comb concentrator is made of high-quality materials, which has excellent durability and reliability, and can provide you with a long-lasting use experience.
Product Description:
Wind Comb Collection Air Mouth Collection Air Nozzle Shape Hair Dryer Air Nozzle Flat Mouth Poly Air Mouth Blow Hair Hairdressing Tool
Material: Plastic
Color: as the picture shows, (Due to the difference between different monitors, the picture may have slight color difference. please make sure you do not mind before ordering, Thank you!)
Package weight: 38g
Package size: 12x7x5cm,(Please allow 1-3mm error due to manual measurement. please make sure you do not mind before ordering.)
